name: setukc-webapp
description: A Web App for the SETU Kayaking Club.

scripts.start: cd /home/ec2-user/witkc-webapp ; DD_TAGS="git.commit.sha:$(git rev-parse head) git.repository_url:https://github.com/MatthewBrazill/witkc-webapp" DD_ENV="prod" node app.js
scripts.test: DD_TAGS="git.commit.sha:$(git rev-parse head) git.repository_url:https://github.com/MatthewBrazill/witkc-webapp" DD_ENV="dev" node app.js

author: Matthew Brazill
